text:
Vouch Financial | San Francisco | https://vouch.com | Full Time | ONSITE

Vouch is the first social network for credit. We help people pool their creditworthiness together so that any member of the network can get access to loans, credit, and financial services at the best possible terms. Vouch is working to increase access to credit and financial power for over 70M working Americans. We are headquartered in San Francisco and is backed by IDG, First Round, Greylock, Stanford University, Data Collective, Core Innovation Capital and Silicon Valley Bank.

What we can offer you:

- Competitive compensation and benefits

- Weekly team lunches

- Fun co-workers, some of whom are very good at karaoke

- A desk in our much-envied SoMa ballpark office location

Vouch culture deck: https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1ucb7oRTPYAPlJ4knef-v...

Positions:

- Data Scientist - https://www.hellohired.com/vouch/jobs/611-data-scientist

- Sr. Frontend Engineer - https://www.hellohired.com/vouch/jobs/613-senior-front-end-e...

- UI Developer - https://www.hellohired.com/vouch/jobs/612-ui-developer
